title: Redmi Note 11
description: A powerful budget phone with Snapdragon 680, 5000mAh battery, 50MP camera, and AMOLED display. Ideal for daily tasks and media consumption.

title: Realme Narzo 50
description: Gaming-focused phone with MediaTek Helio G96, 120Hz display, 5000mAh battery, and triple-camera setup. Great for multitasking and casual gaming.

title: Samsung M13
description: Affordable phone with a large 6.6-inch display, 6000mAh battery, and Exynos 850 processor. Best suited for long-lasting usage and basic tasks.

title: iQOO Z6
description: Performance-centric phone with Snapdragon 695, 5G support, 120Hz refresh rate, and 50MP Eye Autofocus camera. Suitable for gaming and photography.

title: POCO M4 Pro
description: Value-for-money device featuring AMOLED display, 64MP triple camera, 5000mAh battery, and MediaTek Helio G96. Offers a good multimedia experience.

title: OnePlus Nord CE 3 Lite
description: Smooth performer with Snapdragon 695, 108MP camera, 67W SUPERVOOC fast charging, and 6.72'' LCD display. Balanced for daily use and camera lovers.

title: Motorola G73
description: Stock Android experience with Dimensity 930, 50MP Ultra Pixel camera, stereo speakers, and 120Hz display. Good for clean UI and stable performance.

title: Infinix Zero 5G
description: Affordable 5G phone with Dimensity 920 chipset, 120Hz display, and 5000mAh battery. Great choice for entry-level 5G users.

title: Vivo T2
description: Stylish phone with Snapdragon 695, 64MP OIS camera, AMOLED display, and 44W fast charging. Designed for photography and sleek design lovers.

title: Samsung Galaxy A14 5G
description: Reliable choice with Exynos 1330, 90Hz LCD display, 50MP main camera, and 5000mAh battery. Offers consistent performance and battery backup.
